title: VaccineGo - Vaccine Tracker
description:
We'd like to think that someone remembers our immunizations and makes sure our immunization schedule is followed. Alas, that is not the case(
How long ago were you revaccinated for diphtheria and tetanus? Probably never.
If we don't do it ourselves, no one does it.

The VaccineGo app is a tool that protects your family and reminds you in time for upcoming vaccinations.
Don't worry and forget about uncertainty. Now everything will be under control.
With personalized vaccination schedules and timely reminders of upcoming vaccinations, you can keep track of family members' vaccinations, control the dates and never miss a vaccination and revaccination due date again!
We take into account national and epidemic vaccination calendars.

To get started, you need to add your data to the app, choose which vaccines from the epidemic calendar in addition to the national calendar you want to apply and allow the app to send you alerts.
Determine your current vaccination status: try to remember which vaccines you have previously received and when it happened.

The vaccination calendar tells you which vaccinations are due at a certain age. The app calculates vaccination dates based on the national and epidemic calendar. Each vaccination has a description and information about administration.

To track your vaccination status, use the easy-to-view dashboard on the Home screen. You can see which vaccines are currently due, which vaccines are pending, and which vaccines are overdue. 
You can also mark a vaccination as done or cancel it if you decide to skip a particular vaccine.

A special tracker will help you keep track of the type of vaccine, the date and number of vaccinations, the address of the clinic where you were vaccinated, the name of the vaccine and the number of doses needed.
Describe how you feel after vaccination so your doctor can understand your individual reaction to vaccinations.

The VaccineGo app is also designed to keep vaccination schedules when you move to another country by automatically synchronizing your calendars. The app will recalculate the calendars and tell you how to proceed with your immunizations.

Main Functions
- Personalized vaccination calendar:
- Create your personalized vaccination schedule with all doses received and the dates you received them.
Reminders and Alerts:
- Set up personalized reminders for upcoming vaccinations and boosters so you never miss important deadlines.
- Vaccine Information:
- Get up-to-date information about your vaccines, including booster recommendations and other important aspects of your health.
 Secure Data Storage:
- Your personal health information is stored securely and confidentially. The app keeps your data protected and accessible only to you.
Ease of use:
- The intuitive interface makes the app accessible to users of all ages. Add, update and view your data in just a few taps.
Support for different vaccines:
- Interact with different vaccines, taking into account the diversity in global standards and recommendations.
 
VaccineGo is your trusted assistant in vaccination management. It is an intuitive and easy-to-use mobile app designed to make it easy to track your vaccination status and provide you with all the information you need about your health.
VaccineGo - personal vaccine schedule online. From birth and for life. Works for free worldwide

summary: Convenient online vaccine calendar for the whole family with reminders
